reviewText:
Playboy / Playboy Sisters is 54 minutes and was released on video on November 14, 1995. This video contains three Playmates and a lot of beautiful nude sisters. The highlight of this video is the Natural Woman where there are three sets of sisters and six beautiful nude ladies. The only downside is the Malone sisters who are not that sexy at all. The following are the ladies in this video.

Loving Competition\Stacy Sanches (Playboy Playmate of the Month for March 1995 & Playboy Playmate of the Year for 1996) & Kim Sanches-Sweaty nudity in a gym
Stronger Together\Priscilla, Katherine & Christina Martus-Two piece bikinis and full nudity on the beach towel and at the poolside
Mirror Image\Mindy & Mandy Malone-45% lingerie, 45% topless and 10% full nudity
Natural Woman\Tori & Tanya Scarborough, Vanessa & Kristina Mateyko and Corinna (Playboy Playmate of the Month for August 1991 & Playboy Playmate of the Year for 1992)& Dorinda Harney-Full nudity outdoors. The only time the names of the sisters do not appear on the screen.
Cherished Moments\Christina Leardini (Playboy Playmate of the Month for April 1991) & Victoria Kennedy-Sexy lingerie, topless and nudity-Christina only is nude
Double Trouble\Rebecca & Rachel Furman-Nude washing the car
African Art-Georgia & Sarah Wills-Full nudity
Friend & Confidant\Kathleena & Adriana Alexander-After an introduction from the sisters, the sisters are nude briefly at the start of the segment. Most of the nudity comes towards the middle to the end of the segment.

This is one video where the nudity is aplenty. Playboy / Playboy Sisters get an AAAA++++.
